name: satisfied
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: satisfied
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: pleased because you have got what you wanted, or because something has happened in the way that you wanted

example.eg: Are you satisfied with the new arrangement?

dsense.name: satisfied
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: If you are satisfied that something is true, you believe it.

example.eg: The judge was satisfied (that) she was telling the truth.
